Detailed Description

stores the options of an ConfigObject and their defaults

Member Function Documentation

def tools::XMLConfigParser::OptionSet::getOption (   self,
  option 
)

Returns:
the option with given name, if it exists. Otherwise raises ConfigError.

def tools::XMLConfigParser::OptionSet::setDefaults (   self,
  options 
)

Sets the default values.

Deprecated:
: will be deleted

def tools::XMLConfigParser::OptionSet::setOption (   self,
  option,
  value 
)

sets an option to a value The option has to be defined in the default configuration If the option is reset a second time in one ConfigObject a warning is given.

If the optionvalue is the same as the default value a warning is given

Parameters:
option,: the option to change
raises ConfigError if option is unknown
value,: the value of the option

def tools::XMLConfigParser::OptionSet::checkOptionValue (   self,
  option,
  type 
)

check if the option value is allowed.

In simplest case check if string, integer or float, see typedef

  option 
)

Returns:
: if option is in the set
